t:
When I returned home after the year long trip abroad, I was surprised to find a positive pregnancy test kit in my wife's bathroom,
                           and I lost my control.



Now I'm in jail, in the cell opposite to a man who impregnated her.
If she were alive, she'd be testifying at his rape trial tomorrow.
c:
Now I'll have the blood of three on my hands.



#rape #wife #ignorance #heatofthemoment #anger #murder #pregnancy #awayfromhome
